rows.label: tlk43200144_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Look, look!
The Holy Gate of Fontana's open!

rows.label: tlk43200144_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They say that Karam Ruins
are somewhere on the other side...

rows.label: tlk43200144_02_msg0004
rows.name:
but the stairs look soooo long!
I don't think I'd be able to get
to the top...

rows.label: tlk43200144_02_msg0005
rows.name:
If you were gonna go,
I hope you don't run outta steam!
